author: Sue

review: We're very techy at our house and have many other devices to stream content on; from tablets and smart-TV's and BluRay players to PCs and Chromecast dongles. You name it we've likely tried streaming/viewing content on it. (we're cord cutters so no cable TV for us)After getting a Chromecast the $99 price seemed very high, comparatively. I received a promotion for $20 off and thought "why not give it a shot?" we're big fans of Amazon Prime in all its various glory.First thing: unboxing. Normally I wound't say anything about this but the packaging was really awkward to get the unit out of. Had to flip it upside-down and let it fall out. Then the protective films were oddly frustrating and then: no cables or connectors other than power. Being a geek household we had every one needed (HDMI, Ethernet, Optical) but it goes a long way when a company includes those cables when you get their product... especially at a $99 price point.Then, the bane of my existence (hyperbole of course)... there's no "Start from the Beginning" for all the Amazon Prime content!! How could the interface (which is otherwise fantastic) not have that feature?! I have many purchased-TV shows and movies and what happens when I want to sit down and start them over? Go into them, at whatever previous scene, and then rewind? 98% of all other interfaces have a "Start from Beginning" button. This box badly needs that. I beg you Amazon.Otherwise, the interface is really very snappy, the UI is very clean and pretty (the little lens flare that goes over each title when you highlight it is a little irritating) everything is intuitive and the pre-load means the whole streaming experience is made that much better. Not to mention the picture quality. I don't know the exact specs are but compared to console-streaming and even streaming over a nice BluRay player (ours anyway) the picture is absolutely fantastic.Glad we have it at the price-point we paid, but looking forward to the UI update to include the restart show/movie button.UPDATE: there's now a watch from beginning button! Also, the addition (or i missed it in the beginning) of playing Amazon digital music. Brilliant! Full stars ahead!

review: Bought this for my husband for Father's Day. Super Easy to set up, love the walk through. Voice command is my favorite feature. We need an additional cable to connect to our older TV in the living room, it would have been great to have a headphone jack as we could have connected easily then but works great on HDMI equipment. Will be even happier when Prime Music is rolled out to the Fire TV to save switching back to the PC to stream the free music.
